title: Login button unresponsive on mobile
description: Clicking the login button on small screens does nothing.

title: Profile picture not saving
description: Uploading a new profile picture shows success but reverts after refresh.

title: Checkout page stuck at loading spinner
description: Customers cannot complete purchases due to endless loading.

title: Email notifications sent twice
description: Each event triggers two identical email alerts to the same user.

title: Search results not updating after filter
description: Changing the filter shows old results until the page is refreshed.

title: Reports exporting in wrong date format
description: Exported CSV files show dates in US format instead of selected locale.
